tags: weird shit my friends and family say
summary: So I’m talking to my mom about Dan’s charity merch and stuff and like she kinda knows about dan and Phil and she finally turned...
body:
So I’m talking to my mom about Dan’s charity merch and stuff and like she kinda knows about dan and Phil and she finally turned to me and was like “are they together?”

And I just sighed really loudly and was like ‘no one knows’

“What do you mean no one knows?”

‘I dunno. They never said they were or anything but they’ve lived together for nearly a decade’

“Do you think they’re together”

‘Yes’

“Do lots of people think they’re together?”

‘Yes’

“Could they maybe just have secret partners?”

‘4 adults in their late twenties and early thirties all living together when two of them make over a million dollars?’

“Oh yeah I guess that’s pretty stupid”

‘Yeah. One of them goes with the other to visit his family up until Christmas Eve and then goes home to his own family’

“Do their families know?”

‘I’d assume so. They vacation with ones brother and sister-in-law occasionally’

“Maybe they got married before youtube”

‘I hope not.’

“Why?”

‘One of them was 18 and the other was 22.’

“I had your brother at 22.”

‘They weren’t married before youtube.’

“And you’re sure they don’t have secret boyfriends or girlfriends?”

‘Positive. I mean, I’d hate if my partner was always away visiting his best friends family and taking vacations with his best friend, brother, and sister-in-law.’

“Yeah I guess”

————————

Thanks mom

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: When Day Met Night // Phan
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2pNXFf4

by Ihateeveryone2002

Dan Howell isn’t exactly the happiest person, and that is proven true one fateful evening. That particular evening, he’s sure his life will come to an abrupt end.

But his plans are halted by a stranger called Phil Lester, a man who understands the way Dan thinks far better than he lets on.

Words: 1914, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: dan and phil, Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Suicide Attempt, Mental Health Issues, Friendship/Love


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2pNXFf4

summary: I was watching Shane Dawson and feel like I reached a new milestone of the Phandom. Shane said ..."get ready to cringe. And by...
body: I was watching Shane Dawson and feel like I reached a new milestone of the Phandom. Shane said …“get ready to cringe. And by cringe I meant cry” and I said out loud “Don’t cry. CRAFT!”

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: This is just a theory but Dan seems really into making merch and fashion in general. I could see him doing more with that in the...
question: This is just a theory but Dan seems really into making merch and fashion in general. I could see him doing more with that in the future
answer: Fucking same, anon. I feel like at some point in the future, Dan’s “merch store” is going to turn into more of just an actual clothing line. Some kind of cross between Dan just making clothes and accessories, and also making things for charity, like he’s doing for young minds right now.

reblog.comment: Fucking same, anon. I feel like at some point in the future, Dan’s “merch store” is going to turn into more of just an actual clothing line. Some kind of cross between Dan just making clothes and accessories, and also making things for charity, like he’s doing for young minds right now.

Some kind of cross between Dan just making clothes and accessories, and also making things for charity, like he’s doing for young minds right now.

summary:
Hi guys
So I know we've been terrible with keeping active on here recently, but I'm going to try my best to keep on top of it...
body:
Hi guys

So I know we’ve been terrible with keeping active on here recently, but I’m going to try my best to keep on top of it now

A few things came up on both sides that threw a spanner in the works, and while we work on that I’m going to be here more often trying to be active and work on prompts etc

The chapters of AUP are coming, just give us a little more time to get things back on track!

I promise will make it up to you as soon as we aort some stuff out!

We hope you can understand the delay, and stick around with us until we get things back to normal in the coming weeks!

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I'm not as upset about dan straying from youtube as I thought I would be. I'll miss regular content but we still have the gaming...
question: I'm not as upset about dan straying from youtube as I thought I would be. I'll miss regular content but we still have the gaming channel, as long as they continue doing it, and dan seems like such a lovely, kind person despite his screaming and swearing lol. I could easily see going into mental health advocacy being his calling and I'm excited to see what he does.
answer:
That’s the thing. I don’t think we’re going to see him disappear. He’s not quitting youtube, it just seems like he’s doing it on his own terms. And I’m interested to see where it goes as well. If he completely abandons the idea of an upload schedule, and only makes videos when he wants to, will that mean we only get one dinof a year? Or will it re-motivate him to make more content that he enjoys making? It could go either way. And like you said, there’s still the gaming channel, and Phil’s channel is basically a collab channel at this point, so it’s not like he’s going away.


This is honestly what I wanted from the beginning. For Dan to figure his shit out, and just tell us what was happening instead of being weird and vague. And he’s done that. So I’m happy.

reblog.comment:

This is honestly what I wanted from the beginning. For Dan to figure his shit out, and just tell us what was happening instead of being weird and vague. And he’s done that. So I’m happy.

If he completely abandons the idea of an upload schedule, and only makes videos when he wants to, will that mean we only get one dinof a year? Or will it re-motivate him to make more content that he enjoys making? It could go either way. And like you said, there’s still the gaming channel, and Phil’s channel is basically a collab channel at this point, so it’s not like he’s going away.


This is honestly what I wanted from the beginning. For Dan to figure his shit out, and just tell us what was happening instead of being weird and vague. And he’s done that. So I’m happy.
trail.content:
That’s the thing. I don’t think we’re going to see him disappear. He’s not quitting youtube, it just seems like he’s doing it on his own terms. And I’m interested to see where it goes as well. If he completely abandons the idea of an upload schedule, and only makes videos when he wants to, will that mean we only get one dinof a year? Or will it re-motivate him to make more content that he enjoys making? It could go either way. And like you said, there’s still the gaming channel, and Phil’s channel is basically a collab channel at this point, so it’s not like he’s going away.


This is honestly what I wanted from the beginning. For Dan to figure his shit out, and just tell us what was happening instead of being weird and vague. And he’s done that. So I’m happy.
